doc.title: Bronx
doc.plot: Walk with Jazzy Jay to the beat, listen to the rhythm, feel the heat of music vibrating through the soles of your feet. Learn the vibe, learn to rhyme, appreciate your time in da'hood. A deconstructed neighborhood, a reinvention as the birth place of the most influential music today. Revisit secret block parties and scratch contests, and if you dare turn your back to the Bronx, feast on the sweeping view at the river's edge and you will make it out alive.
